org.apache.juneau.rest

Interface RestResourceResolver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestResourceResolver.Null
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRestResourceResolver

    public interface RestResourceResolver
    Class used to resolve Class objects to instances.

    Used to convert classes defined via @RestResource(children) into child instances.

    Subclasses can be created to provide customized resource resolution. These can be associated with REST resources in one of the following ways:

    • @RestResource(resourceResolver) annotation.
    • RestContextBuilder.resourceResolver(Class)/RestContextBuilder.resourceResolver(RestResourceResolver) methods.
    Implementations must provide one of the following public constructors:
    • RestResourceResolver()
    • RestResourceResolver(RestContext)
    See Also:
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Instantiation > Resource Resolvers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RestResourceResolver.Null
      Represents no RestResourceResolver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object resolve(Object parent, Class<?> c, RestContextBuilder builder)
      Resolves the specified class to a resource object.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        Object resolve(Object parent,
               Class<?> c,
               RestContextBuilder builder)
        throws Exception
        Resolves the specified class to a resource object.

        Subclasses can override this method to provide their own custom resolution.

        The default implementation simply creates a new class instance using Class.newInstance().

        Parameters:
        parent - The parent resource (i.e. the instance whose class has the @RestResource(children) annotation.
        c - The class to resolve.
        builder - The initialization configuration for the resource.
        Returns:
        The instance of that class.
        Throws:
        Exception - If class could not be resolved.
